text: Super place pour boire une bonne bière ou un cidre (vraiment bon et frais) après une escapade sur la montagne. L'ambiance est décontractée et les burgers sont délicieux. Le service est sans reproche.

Food selection is eclectic - pub food nouveau I would say. Burgers are hearty with interesting sides (cold curried sweet potatoes) and also the more exotic like pulled pork lasagna and crawfish a la Louisiana. Home made brews, great service a back terrace with a view of the river make this an interesting summer spot.
This is a good place to take a beer, good food with friends. The atmosphere is relax. They have a terrace with a good view on the Mont St-Hilaire mountain and the Richelieu River.
